notes: Patient seen via video platform for routine follow-up. Good connection quality maintained throughout visit.
diagnosisText: Patient seen in office today for hypertension follow-up via Zoom video visit. Patient reports good medication compliance and no new symptoms. Blood pressure well-controlled on current medications. No medication changes needed. Patient seen via video platform with good connection quality. Continue current antihypertensive regimen. Follow up in 3 months. Patient will schedule in-person visit if any issues arise.
